channel.title: Black Mesa Mac?
channel.description: Hey, I just installed Source SDK Base 2007 in steam. But the Black Mesa has a windows installer. how do I install it now? Thanks! ^_^

item.title: Black Mesa Mac?
item.dc:creator: Flatline
item.description:
I see you’ve found the correct thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Mac?
item.dc:creator: Empire
item.description:
FERGUS:

You know there’s a sticky thread with this info right in this subforum?
https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=12746

The post you want to read is this one:
https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showpost.php?p=492084&postcount=3

Mac OS X isn’t official supported. …yet. So you’ll have to use a wine software.
It shall be noted that there most likely will be performance problems using this method

I will give you an advice for common forum usage - Always check sticky threads and use search before creating a new thread.

i’ve played the wine version, and fixed most of the errors with some help from a programming friend. But it doesn’t run very smoothly on wine, so i just wanted a mac version.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Mac?
item.dc:creator: Empire
item.description:
So there isn’t going to be a mac version until the steam release even though the SDK Base 2007 is now on Mac? I checked the Sticky, they are from before the Source SDK Base 2007 was ported for mac.

Read full topic
